text: Be-shak tumhara rab Allah hi hai jiss ney sab aasmanon aur zamin ko cheh roz mein peda kiya hai phir arsh per qaeem hua. Woh shab say din ko aisay tor per chupa deta hai kay woh shab uss din ko jaldi aa leti hai aur sooraj aur chand aur doosray sitaron ko peda kiya aisay tor per kay sab uss kay hukum kay tabey hain. Yaad rakho Allah hi kay liye khas hai khaliq hona aur haakim hona bari khoobiyon say bhara hua hai Allah jo tamam aalam ka perwerdigar hai
